title: Bug, chroma packs not working in new champ select
body: Can't activate my chroma skin at morgana and blitz{{summoner:11}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! I was able to load in with both Morgana and Blitzcrank chromas. Are you experiencing this every time you try to use them? Do the swatches show up for you to select them, or is there no option at all?
